languages.text: "Все мы когда-то были частью Имперской десятины. Псайкерами, доставленными на Терру на {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}черных кораблях{/g}. Но лишь немногие кандидаты годились для обучения астропатии. Еще меньше преуспело в тяжелой подготовке, чтобы быть допущенными к обряду Связывания душ, и почти никто не пережил посвящение".

traits.locale_text: "Все мы когда-то были частью Имперской десятины. Псайкерами, доставленными на Терру на черных кораблях Инквизиции. Но лишь немногие кандидаты годились для обучения астропатии. Еще меньше преуспело в тяжелой подготовке, чтобы быть допущенными к обряду Связывания душ, и почти никто не пережил посвящение".

languages.text: "We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra on the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Black Ships{/g}. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."
languages.original_text: "Все мы когда-то были частью Имперской десятины. Псайкерами, доставленными на Терру на {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}черных кораблях{/g}. Но лишь немногие кандидаты годились для обучения астропатии. Еще меньше преуспело в тяжелой подготовке, чтобы быть допущенными к обряду Связывания душ, и почти никто не пережил посвящение".

traits.locale_text: "We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra in the Inquisition's black ships. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and all but none survived the initiation."

"We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra in the Inquisition's black ships. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and all but none survived the initiation."

"We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra in the Inquisition's black ships. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."

Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."

"We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra on the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Black Ships{/g}. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."

"We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra on the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Black Ships{/g}. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."

languages.text: «Antaño todos formábamos parte del Diezmo Imperial. Los psíquicos se transportaban a Terra en las {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Naves Negras{/g}, pero solo algunos de los candidatos estaban preparados para estudiar Astropatía. Aún menos conseguían completar el riguroso entrenamiento requerido para celebrar una Vinculación del Alma, y casi ninguno de ellos sobrevivía a la iniciación».
languages.original_text: "We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra on the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Black Ships{/g}. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."

traits.locale_text: «Antaño todos formábamos parte del Diezmo Imperial. Los psíquicos se transportaban a Terra en las {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Naves Negras{/g}, pero solo algunos de los candidatos estaban preparados para estudiar Astropatía. Aún menos conseguían completar el riguroso entrenamiento requerido para celebrar una Vinculación del Alma, y casi ninguno de ellos sobrevivía a la iniciación».

languages.text: 「私達はかつて、帝国租税の一部だった。{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}〈黒き船〉{/g}で地球に送られた、異能者の集まりさ。しかし、ごくわずかに感応通信官の研究に必要な力を持つ候補者たちがいた。過酷な試練をやり遂げて魂結びができるようになった者はそれよりさらに少なく、儀式を生き残れた者は、ほとんどいなかった」
languages.original_text: "We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra on the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Black Ships{/g}. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."

traits.locale_text: 「私達はかつて、帝国租税の一部だった。異端審問庁の〈黒き船〉で地球に送られた、異能者の集まりさ。しかし、ごくわずかに感応通信官の研究に必要な力を持つ候補者たちがいた。過酷な試練をやり遂げて魂結びができるようになった者はそれよりさらに少なく、儀式を生き残れた者は、ほとんどいなかった」

languages.text: “我们这些灵能者都是作为帝国什一税上缴的。我们坐上{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}黑船{/g}，一路前往泰拉。不过，只有极少数候选人拥有研究星语能力的力量，至于能完成血腥训练、获得灵魂结合资格的人，更是少之又少。事实上，绝大部分人都是在入会仪式期间就丧命了。”
languages.original_text: "We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra on the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Black Ships{/g}. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."

traits.locale_text: “我们这些灵能者都是作为帝国什一税上缴的。我们坐上{g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}黑船{/g}，一路前往泰拉。不过，只有极少数候选人拥有研究星语能力的力量，至于能完成血腥训练、获得灵魂结合资格的人，更是少之又少。事实上，绝大部分人都是在入会仪式期间就丧命了。”

languages.text: "Wir alle waren einmal Teil des Imperialen Zehnts. Psioniker, die auf den {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Schwarzen Schiffen{/g} der Inquisition nach Terra gebracht wurden. Doch nur wenige der Kandidaten waren geeignet, die Astropathie zu studieren. Noch weniger davon haben die gnadenlose Ausbildung überstanden, die für die Zulassung zur Seelenbindung nötig ist, und fast niemand hat die Initiation überlebt."
languages.original_text: "We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra on the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Black Ships{/g}. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."

traits.locale_text: "Wir alle waren einmal Teil des Imperialen Zehnts. Psioniker, die auf den {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Schwarzen Schiffen{/g} der Inquisition nach Terra gebracht wurden. Doch nur wenige der Kandidaten waren geeignet, die Astropathie zu studieren. Noch weniger davon haben die gnadenlose Ausbildung überstanden, die für die Zulassung zur Seelenbindung nötig ist, und fast niemand hat die Initiation überlebt."

languages.text: « Nous sommes tous issus de la Dîme Impériale. Des psykers débarqués sur Terra à bord des {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Vaisseaux Noirs{/g} de l'Inquisition. Mais seule une poignée de candidats avaient les prédispositions nécessaires pour étudier l'astropathie et bien peu ont survécu à la formation éreintante qui précède le rite initiatique du lien de l'âme. »
languages.original_text: "We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra on the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Black Ships{/g}. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."

traits.locale_text: « Nous sommes tous issus de la Grande Moisson. Des psykers débarqués sur Terra à bord des {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Vaisseaux Noirs{/g} de l'Inquisition. Mais seule une poignée de candidats avaient les prédispositions nécessaires pour étudier l'astropathie et bien peu ont survécu à la formation éreintante qui précède le rite initiatique du lien de l'âme. »

languages.text: "Bir vakitler hepimiz İmparatorluk Aşarı'nın bir parçasıydık. Ruhsezerler, {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Kara Gemilerin{/g} güvertesinde Terra'ya götürüldü. Fakat aralarından yalnızca birkaç tanesi astropatlık çalışmaya uygun yetiye sahipti. Çok daha azı, Ruh Bağlama'ya hak kazanmak için yapılan meşakkatli eğitimi başarıyla tamamlayabildi. Katılımdan ise neredeyse hiçbiri sağ çıkmadı."
languages.original_text: "We were all part of the Imperial Tithe once. Psykers delivered to Terra on the {g|Encyclopedia:BlackShipGlossary}Black Ships{/g}. But only a few of the candidates had what it took to study astropathy. Fewer still successfully completed the gruelling training to be eligible for Soul Binding, and almost none survived the initiation."
